title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Title: Sr. Business Analyst

Team: Data Science and AI

Location: Mumbai(Kalina)

Education Qualification: MBA, MTech. in Quantitative Streams

We are a multi-national logistics . Our Data Science function started in Apr, 2021. It Currently constitutes high performing individuals with rich experience from IITs, Tier 1 Institutions and Foreign Universities As part of the Digital Transformation Journey across the group, the Organization believes the DS Team is critical in harnessing better customer delight and competitive advantage. A long-term roadmap on critical DS initiatives has been established across the Group to achieve the targeted impact

Preferred Technical Skills

Python and SQL programming skills

Experience with one of the data visualization and BI tool such as Tableau or Power BI ,Excel, and Presentation Skills

Roles And Responsibilities

Actionable Insights: Utilizing available data and dashboards to extract relevant information that aligns with business goals and strategic objectives, providing leadership with clear recommendations for action.

Data Storytelling: Crafting compelling visual narratives that effectively communicate insights, making complex data accessible and understandable to stakeholders.

Communication and Presentation: Preparing and delivering presentations to leadership, ensuring clarity and relevance to drive informed decision-making.

Data-Driven Problem Solving: Analyzing business challenges by gathering and preparing data and developing data-driven solutions to address specific problem statements.

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborating with teams across various departments (e.g., sales, finance, operations) to understand business challenges, gather data, and validate insights, fostering a holistic approach to analytics.

Desired Candidate’s Profile


Practical Experience: At least 3 years of hands-on experience in leveraging data to solve business problems and drive decision-making.
Insight Development: Demonstrated ability to identify business challenges, gather and prepare data, create actionable insights, and present findings to management to facilitate informed actions.
Techno-Functional Expertise: Strong understanding of business KPIs, coupled with technical skills in data analysis, statistics and visualization, to provide effective solutions that align with organizational goals.
Industry Knowledge: Experience in the logistics and transportation industry is desirable, enabling a better understanding of specific challenges and operational metrics within the sector.
Analytical Mindset: Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and analytically to derive insights from complex data sets.
Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, capable of translating technical information into clear, actionable insights for diverse audiences.
